701000f-a.text:
Edison Avenue, east sid:, between Randall and Schley Avenues, showing the J. D. Tolfe Mansion. The G. W. Bromley map of 1900 shows the house to be located on the estate of deorge Bruce Brown.
June 1926.

July 1, 1928

Another view of the J.D. Wolfe Mansion.
